objects.text:
• 2 Adorable Cat Figures
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Adjustable Leaf Bed
• Relaxing Hammock

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner design advertises a children's toy playset featuring charming animal figures and accessories. The banner has a soft pastel background with geometric and circular patterns for added visual interest. The title, marked by the "heading" layer, is bold and bright pink, grabbing attention immediately. Just below it, the supportive "subheading" text in a purple-toned font adds context. A bulleted list labeled "description" highlights the product features in dark gray. The lower left section contains standout pricing in the "price" layer, and a vibrant pink button with white text labeled "cta" encourages immediate action. The central right portion displays a fun and colorful toy image labeled "product_image," enhancing visual appeal and context.

**Color Palette**:
- Light Pink (#FFF3F8)
- Hot Pink (#FF4A9D)
- Soft Purple (#A76ED9)
- Bubblegum Pink (#FF6FB5)
- Pale Rose (#FFD8E6)
- Charcoal Gray (#333333)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The image features a vibrant and playful toy setup with a well-balanced pastel and bright color palette. Key colors include bubblegum pink (#F4599E) for the cat house, mint green (#41C491) for grass and leaves, and sandy beige (#F4C39F) for the base. The cats are in warm tones—light brown (#B86A3B) and soft white (#F1F1EE), adding warmth and contrast. Accents like lavender (#B68BDB), bright cyan (#35C3D1), and royal blue (#3757C9) provide depth and visual interest. The colors are skillfully used in contrasting layers, where bright and soft tones blend to enhance each other while still making specific components pop visually.
